Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:20#30087000#relentless bloodclaw arachnens} have taken over the tunnelsâ€”because undead aren't enough! I don't know when they showed up, but if they keep digging into the walls, the tunnels will collapse.

Now, while that would be a great way to take out the undead, it'd also be a great way to take out our soldiers who are deep inside, not to mention the survivors that we're trying to find.

I have soldiers and survivors to deal with, so I need you to head in there and take care of the spiders.

Wow, I didn't even realize how much that vibration they make was bothering me until it stopped.

Thank you for clearing them out.
